statements: SELECT * FROM historical_performance_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, category FROM historical_performance_data ORDER BY category ASC
SELECT date, performance_metric FROM historical_performance_data WHERE category='Sales'
SELECT * FROM historical_performance_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-01-31'
SELECT SUM(performance_metric) AS total_performance FROM historical_performance_data
SELECT * FROM historical_performance_data WHERE category = 'Technology' ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, date, performance_metric FROM historical_performance_data WHERE performance_metric > 0.8 ORDER BY performance_metric ASC
SELECT * FROM historical_performance_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' AND category IN ('Technology', 'Finance') ORDER BY id
SELECT AVG(performance_metric) AS avg_performance FROM historical_performance_data WHERE date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT category, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM historical_performance_data GROUP BY category HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY total_records DESC
SELECT * FROM historical_data
SELECT metric1, metric2 FROM historical_data ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT * FROM historical_data WHERE metric1 > 50
SELECT prediction_id, date, prediction_value FROM predictions
SELECT prediction_value FROM predictions WHERE date = '2022-12-31'
SELECT date, metric1, metric2 FROM historical_data
SELECT metric1, date, metric2 FROM historical_data ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT prediction_id, date, prediction_value FROM predictions WHERE prediction_value > 0.5
SELECT date, metric1 FROM historical_data WHERE metric1 > 50 ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT prediction_id, date, prediction_value FROM predictions WHERE date >= '2023-01-01'
SELECT * FROM performance_data
SELECT id, date, metric1, metric2 FROM performance_data ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT model_name, accuracy, precision FROM model_results WHERE recall > 0.8
SELECT id, timestamp, features->'field1' AS field1, features->'field2' AS field2 FROM training_data WHERE label = 'ClassA'
SELECT id, timestamp AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AS utc_timestamp, features, label FROM training_data ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT * FROM model_results ORDER BY accuracy DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT model_name, accuracy, precision, recall FROM model_results WHERE accuracy > 0.8;
SELECT id, date, metric1 FROM performance_data WHERE metric1 < 100 OR metric2 > 50;
SELECT * FROM training_data WHERE label = 'spam' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, model_name, accuracy FROM model_results JOIN training_data ON model_results.id = training_data.id;
SELECT * FROM historical_data;
SELECT id, date FROM historical_data WHERE performance_metric > 0.8;
SELECT model_name, description FROM predictive_models ORDER BY model_name DESC;
SELECT model_id, predicted_value, actual_value FROM model_performance WHERE date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT training_id, model_id, training_date FROM model_training_data WHERE target_value < 1000 ORDER BY model_id ASC, training_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM historical_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT date, performance_metric FROM historical_data WHERE performance_metric > 0.8 ORDER BY date LIMIT 5;
SELECT model_name, description FROM predictive_models WHERE model_name LIKE '%%regression%%';
SELECT date, predicted_value, actual_value FROM model_performance WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT model_id, JSONB_ARRAY_LENGTH(feature_vector) AS num_features FROM model_training_data ORDER BY num_features DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM historical_performance_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT metric_name, AVG(metric_value) AS average_value FROM historical_performance_data GROUP BY metric_name;
SELECT model_name, author, accuracy FROM predictive_models WHERE accuracy > 0.8 ORDER BY accuracy DESC;
SELECT model_id, date, predicted_value FROM model_predictions WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT model_id, AVG(error_value) AS avg_error FROM model_errors GROUP BY model_id ORDER BY avg_error ASC;
SELECT * FROM historical_performance_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT metric_name, AVG(metric_value) AS average_value FROM historical_performance_data GROUP BY metric_name;
SELECT model_name, author, accuracy FROM predictive_models WHERE accuracy > 0.8;
SELECT model_id, model_name, author, accuracy, creation_date FROM predictive_models WHERE creation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT model_name, evaluation_date, evaluation_score FROM model_evaluation JOIN predictive_models ON model_evaluation.model_id = predictive_models.model_id ORDER BY evaluation_score DESC LIMIT 5;
